cancel-payment-link.description: Cancel a payment link in Cashfree Payment Gateway. Only links in ACTIVE status can be cancelled.

props.name: environment
props.description: Choose the environment for API calls

props.name: linkId
props.description: The payment link ID that you want to cancel. Only ACTIVE links can be cancelled.

props.name: requestId
props.description: Request ID for the API call. Can be used to resolve tech issues

props.name: idempotencyKey
props.description: UUID format idempotency key to avoid duplicate actions if request fails or times out

create-cashgram.description: Create a Cashgram for instant money transfers using Cashfree

props.name: environment
props.description: Choose the environment for API calls

props.name: cashgramId
props.description: Unique ID of the Cashgram. Alphanumeric, underscore (_), and hyphen (-) allowed (35 character limit)

props.name: amount
props.description: Amount to be transferred (minimum 1.00)

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the contact

props.name: phone
props.description: Phone number of the contact

props.name: linkExpiry
props.description: Date to expire the cashgram link. Format: YYYY/MM/DD (maximum 30 days from creation)

props.name: email
props.description: Email of the contact

props.name: remarks
props.description: Specify remarks, if any

props.name: notifyCustomer
props.description: If enabled, a link is sent to customer phone and email

create-order.description: Creates an order in Cashfree Payment Gateway

props.name: environment
props.description: Choose the environment for API calls

props.name: orderAmount
props.description: Bill amount for the order. Provide up to two decimals (e.g., 10.15 means Rs 10 and 15 paisa)

props.name: orderCurrency
props.description: Currency for the order

props.name: customerId
props.description: A unique identifier for the customer. Use alphanumeric values only (3-50 characters)

props.name: customerPhone
props.description: Customer phone number (minimum 10 digits). For international numbers, prefix with +

props.name: customerEmail
props.description: Customer email address (3-100 characters)

props.name: customerName
props.description: Name of the customer (3-100 characters)

props.name: customerBankAccountNumber
props.description: Customer bank account. Required for TPV (Third Party Verification) (3-20 characters)

props.name: customerBankIfsc
props.description: Customer bank IFSC. Required for TPV (Third Party Verification)

props.name: customerBankCode
props.description: Customer bank code. Required for net banking payments with TPV

props.name: orderId
props.description: Order identifier in your system. Alphanumeric, "_" and "-" only (3-45 characters). Will be auto-generated if not provided

props.name: orderNote
props.description: Order note for reference (3-200 characters)

props.name: returnUrl
props.description: URL to redirect customer after payment completion (max 250 characters)

props.name: notifyUrl
props.description: HTTPS URL for server-to-server notifications (max 250 characters)

props.name: paymentMethods
props.description: Comma-separated values: cc,dc,ccc,ppc,nb,upi,paypal,app,paylater,cardlessemi,dcemi,ccemi,banktransfer

props.name: cartName
props.description: Name of the cart

props.name: customerNote
props.description: Note from customer

props.name: shippingCharge
props.description: Shipping charges for the order

props.name: shippingFullName
props.description: Full name for shipping address

props.name: shippingCountry
props.description: Country for shipping address

props.name: shippingCity
props.description: City for shipping address

props.name: shippingState
props.description: State for shipping address

props.name: shippingPincode
props.description: Pincode for shipping address

props.name: shippingAddress1
props.description: Primary address line for shipping

props.name: shippingAddress2
props.description: Secondary address line for shipping

props.name: billingFullName
props.description: Full name for billing address

props.name: billingCountry
props.description: Country for billing address

props.name: billingCity
props.description: City for billing address

props.name: billingState
props.description: State for billing address

props.name: billingPincode
props.description: Pincode for billing address

props.name: billingAddress1
props.description: Primary address line for billing

props.name: billingAddress2
props.description: Secondary address line for billing

props.name: terminalType
props.description: Type of terminal (e.g., SPOS) for SoftPOS orders (4-10 characters)

props.name: terminalId
props.description: Terminal ID for merchant reference (3-100 characters)

props.name: terminalPhoneNo
props.description: Mobile number of the terminal/agent/storefront

props.name: terminalName
props.description: Name of terminal/agent/storefront

props.name: terminalAddress
props.description: Location of terminal

props.name: terminalNote
props.description: Note given by merchant while creating the terminal

props.name: oneClickCheckoutEnabled
props.description: Enable One Click Checkout feature

props.name: verifyPayEnabled
props.description: Enable Verify and Pay feature

props.name: orderTags
props.description: Custom tags as JSON object. Example: {"product":"Laptop","city":"Bangalore"}. Maximum 10 tags

create-payment-link.description: Creates a payment link in Cashfree Payment Gateway

props.name: environment
props.description: Choose the environment for API calls

props.name: linkAmount
props.description: Amount to be collected using this link. Provide up to two decimals for paise

props.name: linkCurrency
props.description: Currency for the payment link

props.name: linkPurpose
props.description: A brief description for which payment must be collected (max 500 characters)

props.name: customerPhone
props.description: Customer phone number (required)

props.name: customerEmail
props.description: Customer email address

props.name: customerName
props.description: Customer name

props.name: customerBankAccountNumber
props.description: Customer bank account number

props.name: customerBankIfsc
props.description: Customer bank IFSC code

props.name: customerBankCode
props.description: Customer bank code for net banking

props.name: linkId
props.description: Unique identifier for the link. Alphanumeric, "-" and "_" only (max 50 characters). Auto-generated if not provided

props.name: linkPartialPayments
props.description: Allow customers to make partial payments for the link

props.name: linkMinimumPartialAmount
props.description: Minimum amount in first installment (required if partial payments enabled)

props.name: linkExpiryTime
props.description: ISO 8601 format. Example: 2021-07-02T10:20:12+05:30. Default is 30 days

props.name: sendSms
props.description: Send SMS notification to customer phone

props.name: sendEmail
props.description: Send email notification to customer email

props.name: linkAutoReminders
props.description: Send automatic reminders to customers for payment collection

props.name: notifyUrl
props.description: HTTPS URL for server-to-server notifications

props.name: returnUrl
props.description: URL to redirect user after payment completion (max 250 characters)

props.name: upiIntent
props.description: Directly open UPI Intent flow on mobile devices

props.name: paymentMethods
props.description: Comma-separated values: cc,dc,ccc,ppc,nb,upi,paypal,app. Leave blank for all methods

props.name: linkNotes
props.description: Key-value pairs as JSON. Maximum 5 key-value pairs. Example: {"key_1":"value_1","key_2":"value_2"}

props.name: orderSplits
props.description: JSON array for Easy Split. Example: [{"vendor_id":"vendor1","amount":100}]

create-refund.description: Initiate a refund for a Cashfree order. Refunds can only be initiated within six months of the original transaction.

props.name: environment
props.description: Choose the environment for API calls

props.name: orderId
props.description: The ID which uniquely identifies your order

props.name: refundAmount
props.description: Amount to be refunded. Should be lesser than or equal to the transaction amount. (Decimals allowed)

props.name: refundId
props.description: An unique ID to associate the refund with. Provide alphanumeric values (3-40 characters)

props.name: refundNote
props.description: A refund note for your reference (3-100 characters)

props.name: refundSpeed
props.description: Speed at which the refund is processed

props.name: refundSplits
props.description: JSON array for vendor splits. Example: [{"vendor_id":"vendor1","amount":100},{"vendor_id":"vendor2","percentage":25}]

props.name: tags
props.description: Custom Tags in JSON format {"key":"value"}. Maximum 10 tags allowed. Example: {"refund_reason":"customer_request","processed_by":"admin"}

props.name: requestId
props.description: Request ID for the API call. Can be used to resolve tech issues

props.name: idempotencyKey
props.description: UUID format idempotency key to avoid duplicate actions if request fails or times out

deactivate-cashgram.description: Deactivate a Cashgram to prevent further redemptions using Cashfree

props.name: environment
props.description: Choose the environment for API calls

props.name: cashgramId
props.description: ID of the Cashgram to be deactivated. Alphanumeric and underscore (_) allowed (35 character limit)

get-orders-for-payment-link.description: View all order details for a payment link in Cashfree Payment Gateway

props.name: linkId
props.description: The payment link ID for which you want to view the order details

props.name: status
props.description: Filter orders by status (default is PAID)

props.description: Request ID for the API call. Can be used to resolve tech issues
